Subject: Re: Triggerhappy
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Wildrider sees Triggerhappy being blasted, "You want I should help him, or
do you wanna" he asks to Drag Strip. "Lets just gut them" Drag Strip yells
turning around, making a huge hole in the ground, and speeds towards
Symphony to ram her. Meanwhile as hes going, his canons turn around and
fire at prowl.

Wildrider lands and opens fire into the air towards the ariborn maximal,
again filling the sky with lasers.
